root.name: Cookie
root.description: The player controls a diminutive chef, Charlie. Charlie can launch bags of flower which can stun and deflect enemies on the screen. The task is to deflect edible items such as chocolate into the mixing bowl at the bottom of the screen, while deflecting 'junk' items like fish bones into the trash cans at either side. The junk items are thrown from the trash cans by a shameless rip off of Oscar the Grouch
